title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.1 - Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.1 - Authority

State Regulations

In accordance with chapter 385 of the Laws of 1996 and
notwithstanding 17 NYCRR Part
156
or any other regulation to the contrary, the
department is authorized to publicly offer, solicit and accept bids and
proposals and to enter into agreements, contracts or leases for the
construction and operation of suitable facilities for gas stations, restaurants
and other commercial facilities for the service and convenience of the public
at the site of exit 51 of the Long Island Expressway, the service roads of the

Long Island Expressway and at other sites as determined by the Commissioner of

Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
